actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that daylight saving time shall begin each year on the last Sunday in February rather than the last Sunday in April.

summary.text: Amends the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to change the date on which daylight saving time begins from the last Sunday in April to the last Sunday in February.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that daylight saving time shall begin each year on the last Sunday in February rather than the last Sunday in April.
